name: Twin Stick Tanks
description:
Twin Stick Tanks is an action packed tank shooting party game where you battle to blow eachothers tops off in an explosive plume of smoke! Navigate through the level and crush fences to out position your opponent.

Twin Stick Tanks is fun with 2 players, great with 3 players, and a BLAST with 4 players!

Featuring

  • 2 to 4 player local multiplayer (online multiplayer planned)
  • Remote play together enabled
  • Explosive top blowing action!
  • Over 50 preset levels (level editor planned)
  • Controller support
